description: AST nodes for C++ classes, structs, and member functions

nodes.name: RecordDecl
nodes.translation_notes: Direct mapping for pure C structs.
nodes.example_cpp: struct Point { int x; int y; };
nodes.example_c: struct Point { int x; int y; };

nodes.name: CXXRecordDecl
nodes.purpose: Represents a C++ class or struct declaration
key_methods: hasDefinition() - True if class is defined
isAbstract() - True if has pure virtual methods
nodes.translation_notes: Translate to C struct. Methods become functions with 'this' parameter.
nodes.example_cpp: class Counter { int count; void inc(); };
nodes.example_c: struct Counter { int count; }; void Counter_inc(struct Counter* this);

nodes.name: FieldDecl
nodes.purpose: Represents a field (member variable) in a struct/class
nodes.translation_notes: Direct mapping. All fields become public in C struct.

nodes.name: CXXMethodDecl
key_methods: getParent() - Returns CXXRecordDecl of containing class
nodes.translation_notes: Add 'struct ClassName* this' as first parameter. Name becomes ClassName_methodName.

nodes.name: CXXConstructorDecl
nodes.inherits_from: CXXMethodDecl → FunctionDecl → DeclaratorDecl → ValueDecl → NamedDecl → Decl
nodes.translation_notes: Translate to ClassName__ctor function with 'this' parameter. Initialize fields.
nodes.example_c: void Counter__ctor(struct Counter* this, int n) { this->count = n; }

nodes.name: CXXDestructorDecl
nodes.inherits_from: CXXMethodDecl → FunctionDecl → DeclaratorDecl → ValueDecl → NamedDecl → Decl
nodes.translation_notes: Translate to ClassName__dtor function. Call cleanup for fields.

nodes.name: MemberExpr
nodes.purpose: Represents a member access expression (obj.field or ptr->field)
key_methods: getMemberDecl() - The field or method being accessed
nodes.translation_notes: For field access, direct mapping. For methods, see CXXMemberCallExpr.

nodes.name: CXXMemberCallExpr
nodes.purpose: Represents a call to a member function
nodes.c_equivalent: C function call with object as first argument

nodes.name: CXXThisExpr
nodes.purpose: Represents the 'this' pointer in member functions

nodes.name: CXXOperatorCallExpr
nodes.purpose: Represents a call to an overloaded operator
key_methods: getOperator() - Returns operator kind (OO_Plus, OO_EqualEqual, etc.)
nodes.translation_notes: Translate to function call: ClassName_operator_add(lhs, rhs).
